options.A: Users can terminate an EC2 instance in any AWS Region except us-east-1.
options.B: Users can terminate an EC2 instance with the IP address 10.100.100.1 in the us-east-1 Region.
options.C: Users can terminate an EC2 instance in the us-east-1 Region when the user's source IP is 10.100.100.254.
options.D: Users cannot terminate an EC2 instance in the us-east-1 Region when the user's source IP is 10.100.100.254.

explanation: The policy allows ec2:TerminateInstances from IP range 10.100.100.0/24, and denies all EC2 actions outside us-east-1. Combined effect: users can terminate instances only in us-east-1 when their source IP is in 10.100.100.0/24.
